item.title: Course Resources
item.description: This page is meant to augment the core documents by providing easy access to online elements of the course. The Syllabus contains a full list of resources, including those not available online. Core Documents There are two documents for this course that spell out what is required: Syllabus Reading List Course Website This course website will be updated regularly throughout the semester. I’ll add a page on the menu for each week, and include links to lecture slides, YouTube videos, and notes about specific topics.
